8.1 M BBM (BlackBerry Messenger) is the official instant messaging tool from BlackBerry, which now allows you to exchange messages and chat with other BlackBerry users, and also with users of Android and iOS devices. The BBM application is always on in the background of your terminal, so you’ll know straight away if you receive a message. In the same way, the application informs you when your messages reach their destination, and of course, when they have been read. As usual in this type of application, BBM (BlackBerry Messenger) can also send pictures, voice messages and several different document types. The smileys, of course, are also available on the application. For privacy issues, BBM offers a number of features. Users can choose their contacts, and can control who can send messages and who cannot. In the same way, you can create groups, although even if you don´t have them in your contact list. BBM (BlackBerry Messenger) is a very powerful instant messaging tool, which lets you communicate quickly with all your friends and acquaintances. It proves to be an excellent alternative to Whatsapp or LINE, and offers immediacy and convenience. Opinions about BBM No opinions about BBM . Be the first! Comment
